data.question: What is the chemical formula of PCN-226(Cu)?
What method was used for the structure determination of PCN-226?
What is the BET surface area of PCN-226(Cu)?
What is the peak power density of PCN-226(Co) in a rechargeable Zn-air battery?
Does PCN-226(Co) show better ORR performance compared to molecular catalyst Co-TCPP?
data.answer: Yes, PCN-226(Co) shows an improved ORR performance by limiting deactivation pathways.

data.question: Is PCN-226 stable in both acidic and basic conditions?
data.answer: Yes, PCN-226 shows little alteration in PXRD patterns after being treated in acid and base solutions for 7 days, indicating stability.

data.question: Can PCN-226(Co) tolerate methanol crossover in ORR?
data.answer: Yes, PCN-226(Co) exhibits superior tolerance to methanol crossover compared to Pt/C.

data.question: Is PCN-226(Co) a bifunctional catalyst for both ORR and OER?
Does PCN-226(Co) maintain its composition after electrochemical stability test?
data.answer: True, the composition of PCN-226(Co) remains unchanged after the electrochemical stability test.

data.question: Is the theoretical surface area of PCN-226 calculated based on the structural model?
Does PCN-226(Co) exhibit a higher peak power density than Pt/C+RuO2 in Zn-air batteries?
Is PCN-226(Co) derived from a metal-organic framework?
Does PCN-226(Co) show a decrease in activity after 50 hours in a durability test for Zn-air batteries?
data.answer: False, PCN-226(Co) displayed a discharge/charge durability for at least 160 hours.

data.question: Is the electron transfer number (n) of PCN-226(Co) for ORR higher than that of Pt/C?
data.answer: False, the electron transfer number (n) of PCN-226(Co) is slightly lower than that of Pt/C.

data.question: Does PCN-226(Co) undergo decomposition after the electrochemical stability test?
data.answer: False, PCN-226(Co) remained intact without decomposition after the electrochemical stability test.
